rolonged pregnancy 
• Prolonged pregnancy:
o Pregnancy exceeding 42 weeks (294 days) from the first day of the LNMP.
• Postdates pregnancy
o Pregnancy exceeding the Estimated Date of Delivery (EDD, which is 280 days from the first day of the
